GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of a specified ID

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of the posted comment for the given article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the updated article for the given article_id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment specified by comment_id
